title: Championship Sunday preview
itunes:title: Championship Sunday preview
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- preview Championship Sunday and make their picks for both games. Plus, reaction to the latest coaching news around the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
